00012 template <typename T>
00013 vector<vector<Point_<T> > > MxArrayToVecVecPt(MxArray& arr)
00014 {
00015     vector<MxArray> va = arr.toVector<MxArray>();
00016     vector<vector<Point_<T> > > vvp;
00017     vvp.reserve(va.size());
00018     for (vector<MxArray>::iterator it=va.begin(); it<va.end(); ++it)
00019     {
00020         vector<MxArray> v = (*it).toVector<MxArray>();
00021         vector<Point_<T> > vp;
00022         vp.reserve(v.size());
00023         for (vector<MxArray>::iterator jt=v.begin(); jt<v.end(); ++jt)
00024             vp.push_back((*jt).toPoint_<T>());
00025         vvp.push_back(vp);
00026     }
00027     return vvp;
00028 }

00031 template <typename T>
00032 vector<vector<Point3_<T> > > MxArrayToVecVecPt3(MxArray& arr)
00033 {
00034     vector<MxArray> va = arr.toVector<MxArray>();
00035     vector<vector<Point3_<T> > > vvp;
00036     vvp.reserve(va.size());
00037     for (vector<MxArray>::iterator it=va.begin(); it<va.end(); ++it)
00038     {
00039         vector<MxArray> v = (*it).toVector<MxArray>();
00040         vector<Point3_<T> > vp;
00041         vp.reserve(v.size());
00042         for (vector<MxArray>::iterator jt=v.begin(); jt<v.end(); ++jt)
00043             vp.push_back((*jt).toPoint3_<T>());
00044         vvp.push_back(vp);
00045     }
00046     return vvp;
00047 }

00057 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00058                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00059 {
00060     // Check the number of arguments
00061     if (nrhs<3 || ((nrhs%2)!=1) || nlhs>5)
00062         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00063     
00064     // Argument vector
00065     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00066     
00067     vector<vector<Point3f> > objectPoints = MxArrayToVecVecPt3<float>(rhs[0]);
00068     vector<vector<Point2f> > imagePoints = MxArrayToVecVecPt<float>(rhs[1]);
00069     Size imageSize = rhs[2].toSize();
00070     Mat cameraMatrix = Mat::eye(3,3,CV_32FC1);
00071     Mat distCoeffs;
00072     vector<Mat> rvecs;
00073     vector<Mat> tvecs;
00074     
00075     // Option processing
00076     int flags=0;
00077     for (int i=3; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00078         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00079         if (key=="CameraMatrix")
00080             cameraMatrix = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32F);
00081         else if (key=="DistCoeffs")
00082             distCoeffs = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32F);
00083         else if (key=="UseIntrinsicGuess" && rhs[i+1].toBool())
00084             flags |= CV_CALIB_USE_INTRINSIC_GUESS;
00085         else if (key=="FixPrincipalPoint" && rhs[i+1].toBool())
00086             flags |= CV_CALIB_FIX_PRINCIPAL_POINT;
00087         else if (key=="FixAspectRatio" && rhs[i+1].toBool())
00088             flags |= CV_CALIB_FIX_ASPECT_RATIO;
00089         else if (key=="ZeroTangentDist" && rhs[i+1].toBool())
00090             flags |= CV_CALIB_ZERO_TANGENT_DIST;
00091         else if (key=="FixK1" && rhs[i+1].toBool())
00092             flags |= CV_CALIB_FIX_K1;
00093         else if (key=="FixK2" && rhs[i+1].toBool())
00094             flags |= CV_CALIB_FIX_K2;
00095         else if (key=="FixK3" && rhs[i+1].toBool())
00096             flags |= CV_CALIB_FIX_K3;
00097         else if (key=="FixK4" && rhs[i+1].toBool())
00098             flags |= CV_CALIB_FIX_K4;
00099         else if (key=="FixK5" && rhs[i+1].toBool())
00100             flags |= CV_CALIB_FIX_K5;
00101         else if (key=="FixK6" && rhs[i+1].toBool())
00102             flags |= CV_CALIB_FIX_K6;
00103         else if (key=="RationalModel" && rhs[i+1].toBool())
00104             flags |= CV_CALIB_RATIONAL_MODEL;
00105         else
00106             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00107     }
00108     
00109     // Process
00110     double d = calibrateCamera(objectPoints, imagePoints, imageSize,
00111         cameraMatrix, distCoeffs, rvecs, tvecs, flags);
00112     plhs[0] = MxArray(cameraMatrix);
00113     if (nlhs>1)
00114         plhs[1] = MxArray(distCoeffs);
00115     if (nlhs>2)
00116         plhs[2] = MxArray(d);
00117     if (nlhs>3)
00118         plhs[3] = MxArray(rvecs);
00119     if (nlhs>4)
00120         plhs[4] = MxArray(tvecs);
00121 }
